quizzes.title: Knowledge Quiz: Movie and Actor
quizzes.description: Test your knowledge knowledge with this comprehensive quiz! Features 15 questions covering Knowledge, actor, pop. Includes 5 easy, 5 medium, and 5 challenging questions. Can you achieve a passing score of 70%?

questions.question: How does Billy Costigan tell Sullivans girlfriend (the criminal psychiatrist) that he is an informant for the Irish mob?

options.text: meets her in an alley and divulges the information
sends her a tape/dvd in the mail

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: sends her a tape/dvd in the mail

questions.question: This Emmy Award-winning comedy series was based on the lives of four women living together in Miami Beach, Florida.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Golden Girls

questions.question: Michael J. Fox won three consecutive Emmy Awards for Outstanding Actor in a Comedy Series for his role as Alex Keaton in the hit comedy series Family Ties.
What actor plays the part of Simon Bishops agent and friend, Frank Sachs, in the great movie As Good As It Gets?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Cuba Gooding Jr.

questions.question: This comedy starring Don Adams won two Emmy Awards for Outstanding Comedy Series in 1968 and 1969.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Get Smart

questions.question: The 60s pop band The Monkees starred in their own show of the same name and won two Emmy Awards for Outstanding Comedy Series in 1966 and 1967.
Who kills Sgt. Colin Sullivan at the end of the movie The Deprated?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Staff Sgt. Sean Dignam

questions.question: What actor plays the part of the homosexual artist Simon Bishop in the hit movie As Good As It Gets?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Greg Kinnear

questions.question: Shelley Long and Kirstie Alley both won Emmy Awards for Outstanding Lead Actress in a Comedy Series for this perennial Emmy nominee.
This actor won the Emmy Award for Outstanding Lead Actor in a Comedy Series for his part as the bumbling Jack Tripper in Threes Company.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: John Ritter

questions.question: What year did the Academy Award-nominated film As Good As It Gets first hit the theatres in the United States?
What year did the sensational movie Rocky first hit the movie theatres?
The last scene in the movie The Departed shows a rodent crawling on Sullivans balcony railing. The rodent appears after Sullivan was shot in the head. What type of rodent was it?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: a rat

questions.question: What does Melvin Udall do for a living in the great movie As Good As It Gets?
Despite its immense popularity during its entire ten-year run, this show won its only Emmy Award for Outstanding Comedy Series in 2002.

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Mr. Waternoose

questions.question: Pedro Cerrano, played by actor Dennis Haysbert in the movie Major League, came to the U.S. as a defector from Cuba. He escaped for the purposes of religious freedom. What was his religion?

In the movie Major League, the team started winning and were asked to do a TV commercial for a credit card company. For which company did they do this commercial that included the line, dont steal home without it, a variation of the companys actual slogan.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: American Express

questions.question: What is the name of the scare floor secretary in the animated movie Monsters, Inc.?
At the end of the movie As Good As It Gets, Carol and Melvin who start a relationship together are walking somewhere. Where are they going to so early in the morning?
Why does Carol Connelly quit her job as a waitress in the restaurant in the movie As Good As It Gets?

options.text: She wants to go to Hawaii but her boss wont give her time off.
She needed a break from Melvin and his antics.
She asked for a raise but didnt get it.
to take care of her chronically ill son

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: to take care of her chronically ill son

quizzes.title: Sports Quiz: Movie and League

questions.question: In Fatal Attraction, Alex Forrest kidnaps Ellen Gallagher (Dans daughter) from school.

Why was the All American Girls Professional Baseball League (AAGPBL) created in the first place in the great movie A League of Their Own?

options.text: The women were bored and wanted to play ball.
JustSomeGuy was bored and felt like starting his own Baseball League.
World War ll was going to shut down Major League Baseball due to the fact that many of the players were in the military.
The powerful Womens Lib Movement struck a deal with Major League Baseball.

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: World War ll was going to shut down Major League Baseball due to the fact that many of the players were in the military.
